description.text: The aim of this submodule is modeling adapters that parse and forward requests, responses, and notifications between ManagementServices and AgentServices by Management Interfaces (i.e., NetAppMI, NetSlicerMI and NetInterASMI) defined in the ServiceAccessPoint.

reference.text: RFC 7950 - The YANG 1.1 Data Modeling Language

description.text: The AdapterService models an Adapter in charge of parsing and forwarding request, response, and notifications between the ManagementService and the AgentService.
Inherits the defintion of AdapterService, it is related to the Adapter for the NetApps in the Application Plane.
Inherits the defintion of AdapterService, it is related to the Adapter for the NOSs in the Control Plane.
Inherits the defintion of AdapterService, it is related to the Adapter for the Slicers in the Control Plane.
Inherits the defintion of AdapterService, it is related to the Adapter for the NetInterAS in the Control Plane.
Inherits the defintion of AdapterService, it is related to the Adapter for the NetDevs in the Data Plane.

Represents the relationship between AdapterServices and its hosting system, holds the Adapter and Manager leaves referred to the adapter leaf and manager leaf, respectively, for indicating that the AdapterServices may be hosted on the Manager or the Adapter.

Represents the system hosting the Management Services (e.g., a Configuration Service may be carried out as a Web application running on a Manager that may be either an Apache Tomcat or a GlassFish Server). It is referred to the representing leaf of the manager in the Manager submodule.
Represents a system that may host the AdapterService. It is referred to the representing leaf of the adapter in the Adapter submodule.
Relates the AdapterServices to the ManagementServices by the ServiceAccessPoint tagged as AdapterInterface.
Relates the AdapterServices to the ManagementServices by the ServiceAccessPoint tagged as AdapterInterface.
Models the communication point from the AdapterServices to the AgentServices by the ServiceAccessPoint tagged as ManagementInterface.
Models the communication point from the AdapterServices to the AgentServices by the ServiceAccessPoint tagged as ManagementInterface.
Represents the interface provided by the communication with the Agent.
Identifies the communication protocol used to interact with a specific AgentService.
